#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
//#define ll long long int


int main()
{int a[26],n,i,t,z,res;
scanf("%d",&t);


for(z=0;z<t;z++)
{
   string starter,s;
  
   cin>>starter>>s;
   n=s.length();
    
   for(i=0;i<26;i++)
   {a[i]=0;}
   
   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
   {a[s[i]-'a']++;}
   
   res=a[0];
   for(i=1;i<26;i++)
   {res=res^a[i];}
   
   if(res==0) //starter looses
   {
       if(starter[0]=='T')
       {printf("Varun\n");}
       else
       {printf("Tarun\n");}
   }
   else
   {
       if(starter[0]=='T')
       {printf("Tarun\n");}
       else
       {printf("Varun\n");}
   }
   
}    
return 0;
}
